QuestData.Title: The Impossible Plan
QuestData.Description:
Everything is in place for us to seize a necropolis. I will coordinate our efforts and meet you at the Seat of the Primus.
Draka will undoubtedly commend you on your success. I, however, will do so once our mission is complete.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report back to Draka at the Seat of the Primus.
